name: unbecoming
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal Unbecoming clothes do not look attractive on a particular person.
Unbecoming behaviour is not correct or not acceptable: He was charged with conduct unbecoming (to) an officer.

not suitable or acceptable: Such conduct is unbecoming to an official.
